META.TITLE: Grade Employee Mart | Grade Ltd. | Grade E-Mart
META.DESCRIPTION: Grade Ltd. is your tech-enabled solution to rising prices and superfluous middlemen. By eliminating distributors and dealers, we bring you quality products at pocket-friendly prices, ensuring end-to-end digitalization. Whether you`re a B2B partner or part of our employee network, experience transparent pricing in our tech-driven platform.

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: The most popular and reliable website for making restaurant reservations in Bangladesh. A user-friendly app that makes dining out easier. Select, Click, Reserve, and enjoy hassle-free dining experiences.
FOOTER.NEWSLETTER_DESCRIPTION: Subscribe to our newsletter to get updates on our latest offers!
